    Author:
    Francisco Jos√© Morero Peyrona Official web site at: https://github.com/peyrona/mingle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      date​(java.lang.Object... args)
      Class constructor.
      A date can be created in the following ways: String: date( "2022-06-19" ) Numbers: date( 2022,06,19 ) Empty: date() --> today's date Any other combination of values will produce an error.

    • Constructor Detail

      • date

        public date​(java.lang.Object... args)
        Class constructor.
        A date can be created in the following ways:
        • String: date( "2022-06-19" )
        • Numbers: date( 2022,06,19 )
        • Empty: date() --> today's date
        Any other combination of values will produce an error.
        Parameters:
        args - One or more objects.

      • isLeap

        public boolean isLeap()
        Checks if the year is a leap year, according to the ISO proleptic calendar system rules.
        Returns:
        true if the year contained in this date is leap.

      • weekday

        public int weekday()
        Returns the numeric value for the day of the week.
        The int value follows the ISO-8601 standard, from 1 (Monday) to 7 (Sunday).
        Returns:
        The numeric value for the day of the week.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(java.lang.Object o)
        Compares this date to another date.

        Returns:

        • 1 : when this date is bigger (ahead in time) than passed date.
        • 0 : when this date is the same as the one passed date.
        • -1 : when this date is lower (before in time) than passed date.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable
        Parameters:
        o - Date to compare (argument must be of type date).
        Returns:
        1, 0 or -1
